definition: surname Xiang
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 13), occurring in 用, 同, 网 etc/see also 同字框[tong2 zi4 kuang4]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
direction/orientation/path to follow/CL:個|个[ge4]
direction/strike (i.e. angle of inclination in geology)/inclination/trend/to move towards/to head for
to change direction/fig. to change one's stance
to get lost/to lose one's way
to change direction/fig. to change one's stance
to get lost/to lose one's way
trend/tendency/orientation
upward/up/to advance/to try to improve oneself/to make progress
always (previously)/a period of time in the recent past
intention/purpose/intent/inclination/disposition
to be oriented towards/orientation
forward/onward
to orientate/directional/directed/orienteering
bidirectional/two-way/interactive
down/downward
to point towards/aimed at/facing/the direction indicated

sentences.english: So is an change for the better, like birth and death which convulse the body.
sentences.chinese: 向更好的轉變也是如此，和顛覆身體的生死一樣。

sentences.english: They are marching off to gyms and discovering face cream in record numbers.
sentences.chinese: 他們向健身房進軍，物色到的面霜數目已創歷史新高。

sentences.english: The crowd greeted the performers with boos and hiss es.
sentences.chinese: 觀衆向演出者發出一片噓聲。

sentences.english: Whether to apply to any other CIML Member for a certificate?
sentences.chinese: 是否向其它國家的CIML委員有過申請？

sentences.english: But in the third week of May, currents drew some of the oil southeast.
sentences.chinese: 但到了5月的第三週，洋流開始把浮油帶向東南方向。

sentences.english: I authorize you to hit 'em a tremendous whack.
sentences.chinese: 我授權你們，向他們放一排狠毒的排槍。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the projection from the vestibular nuclei to the spinal cord.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大鼠前庭神經核羣向脊髓的投射纖維特徵。

sentences.english: Moni tor work quality and feedback abnormality to WT engineer.
sentences.chinese: 監督工作質量並及時向工程師反饋異常。

sentences.english: Cor. 2:8 Therefore I exhort you to confirm your love toward him.
sentences.chinese: 林後二8所以我勸你們，要向他證實你們的愛。

sentences.english: Many spot lights towards a central point on a piece of white paper.
sentences.chinese: 衆多的聚光燈都照向一張白紙的中心點。

sentences.english: And the fairy mistress of dreams is coming towards you, flying through the twilight sky.
sentences.chinese: 仙鄉里的夢婆飛過朦朧的天空，向你飛來。

sentences.english: I should like to express my heartfelt gratitude for your gracious receptionhospitality.
sentences.chinese: 我願向你們盛情的接待與款待表示衷心的感謝。

sentences.english: The perichondrium carries the blood supply to the cartilage.
sentences.chinese: 軟骨膜是向軟骨輸送血液的。

sentences.english: In what direction should the pilot head in order to travel due north ?
sentences.chinese: 爲使這架飛機向正北航行，駕駛員應取什麼航向？

sentences.english: Catholics pray to Mary as an intercessor.
sentences.chinese: 天主教徒向瑪利亞祈禱，並把她看作仲裁者。

sentences.english: S. senator. In Congress, Johnson was a strong advocate of America's westward expansion.
sentences.chinese: 在國會里，強森大力支持美國向西部擴張的計畫。

definition: variant of 並|并[bing4]
to take the initiative/to do sth of one's own accord/spontaneous/active/opposite: passive 被動|被动[bei4 dong4]/drive (of gears and shafts etc)
to press charges/to file a complaint
to tell/to inform/to let know
to supply/to provide
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)
aim/clear
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
really and truly
see 的士[di1 shi4]
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to raise (an issue)/to propose/to put forward/to suggest/to post (on a website)/to withdraw (cash)
and/to give/together with
to take part in
variant of 歟|欤[yu2]
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
surname He/Japanese (food, clothes etc)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
his/her/its/their/that/such/it (refers to sth preceding it)
to issue (an order, decree etc)/to send out/to dispatch/to produce (a sound)/to let out (a laugh)
just at (that time)/right in (that place)/right in the middle of (doing sth)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to express/to show/to say/to state/to indicate/to mean
to phone/to telegram
